title: Brudermord - Fratricide (2005 - Germany) Kurdish refugee drama
description:
Brudermord (2005 - Luxembourg, Germany, France)                        Fratricide

Drama
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0470702/


Locarno International Film Festival - WON - Jury | Special Mention | Silver Leopard

Fratricide provocatively confronts the burning European question of refugees. The setting is Germany, the people the Kurds. Yilmaz Arslan combines a complex plot about two brothers with scenes of visceral violence as well as a tender picture of caring friendship. His film is both an accusation against racism and neglect and a plea for common humanity and decency.

Boasting astonishing performances from a largely non-professional cast, Fratricide is an explosive tale of desperate conflict and bloody revenge, a savage, furious, and heartbreaking portrait of raw humanity struggling for safety, for dignity, for survival in the face of violence, exile and the brutal indifference of a society that wants no part of them.


Video: XviD, 624x336, 23.976 fps, 899 Kbps, 01h35m26s
Audio: MP3, 48000 Hz, joint stereo, 114 kbps

DVDRip, Turkish audio with Kurdish and German, optional subtitles English, Spanish
